choices: Johnny wakes up again in wet clothes.
Johnny is shaken awake by somebody.
1131.content:
Susan walked into the room, rubbing her eyes.
         "Hey Johnny, have you seen my glasses? I can't find them anywhere!" she cried in anger.
         "Sorry Susan, I haven't s-seen them around." Johnny was scared, his sister hadn't seen his accident yet, but she would soon. "H-hey, could you look for them t-tomorrow, I am REALLY tired."
         "What's with the stutter? Are you trying to hide something from me?" Susan asked questioningly. Out of nowhere, Susan jumped onto the bed, only to scream softly when her feet became wet. "Um...Johnny? Is this what you were stuttering for?" Johnny started to get tears in his eyes. "Y-yeah, please Susan, please don't tell mom or dad, I promise it was just a freak accident." Susan's eyes went soft at that point, she jumped off the bed and kneeled down next to him.
         "Okay little brother, but you need to promise me something, okay?" she asked soothingly. Johnny nodded quickly, he was glad that she was being nice for once. "Do you promise that if this happens again, you will let Mary and I fix it?" He nodded again, so happy that her request wasn't insane. "Okay, good. Let's get you cleaned up then. I'm gonna go throw all of your wet stuff into the washing machine, can you change into something decent?" And with that, Johnny got changed into some dry clothes, and went to sleep again, his problems gone for the moment.

What happens next?
1131.title: Someone from his family

choices: Testing out tablets that did a multitude of things.
11311.content:
"Ugh, last night was awful", Johnny moans as he sits up in his bed. He lifts up his blankets, only to find that his pajamas were soaked, he had wet himself again! He decided not to mention to Susan this situation, as he was scared about what she would do to "treat" him. Johnny threw on some older clothes he had, as all of his other ones were either too dirty or in the wash. He walked downstairs to the kitchen donning a pair of kiddie underwear and a long tee. The only person sitting in the kitchen was Mary, who was making toast.
"Hey Johnny, what's with the outfit? Is that what you wore after your accident?" Mary giggled a bit. Johnny became very red-faced, he hadn't expected Susan to tell Mary so soon.
"Yeah, but I also don't have many clean clothes left, so I was kinda forced to wear these." Johnny said.
"Are those Tiny'Mon underwear? Didn't you grow out of that years ago?" Mary asked questioningly. "Yeah, but why throw them out, they still fit just fine." Johnny retorted. "Alright, fine, mom and dad went to take Dukey to the Vet like they said they would, so that leaves us with time for you to test out an experiment we have been working on. Come on up when you have a second."
Johnny ate breakfast quick, and ran up to the upstairs to do another experiment, still eager even though the last one left him in such bad shape.


What is the experiment?

11411.content: Johnny didn't want to wear sleepy-pants. His parents argued with him, finally they threatened to let his sisters handle his bed wetting. Johnny hung his head in defeat. He slipped on a pair of training pants. Johnny wanted to cry, but knew he couldn't not with his sisters watching. He could hear their laughter echo down the hall as they headed towards their room. Johnny came home from school early. He couldn't beleive he wet his pants again. Worse of all he wet during gym class. Everybody saw him. Now Bling Bling Kid won't let him live it down. Johnny's mom was disappointed when he told her the sorted details. "Honey you should have called, you threw of all off schedule. You know your father and I had plans this afternoon. Guess I'll reschedule for tonight, oh darn but your sisters have their after school young genius club. And your too young to stay at home by yourself. I hope I can find a babysitter on such short notice." His mother said. "Babysitter? He questioned. "Mom I'm too old for a babysitter. Remember Mrs. Krutch said." Johnny said matter of factly. "Honey, your so not old enough to stay home alone. You can't even make it to the bathroom on time. Oh I git it I hope he's available. He told me he needed the money and you hurt poor old Mrs. Krutch with that horrible prank." His mother said leaving him to make a phone call. Johnny dear your babysitter will be over at six okay. Behave. I told him to help get you changed seeing as how you put on your training pants the wrong way.No mischief young man or else." Johnny sat in his room sulking. He was alone seeing as how Duke sold him out to go with the twins as their guinea pig. Deep in contemplation on his current situation Johnny barely heard the doorbell. The babysitter. He said to himself. Johnny answered the door expecting some old geezer, but he was shocked and embarassed when he was face to face with none other than Gil Nexdor."Woah when your parents told me they needed a babysitter I assumed you had a baby brother. I didn't know you were the baby." Gil said surprised."I'm not a baby. Your stupid, the girls aren't here leave!" Johnny ranted. "Woah little man chill out. I'm not leaving I'm getting my five bucks, oh and you so are a baby. See you wet your pants." Gil said pointing at the wet spot on Johnny's' shorts. Johnny blushed. "Now baby go upstairs so Gil can change you." Gil cooed at Johnny. Johnny cringed. He never been so humiliated.

114121.content:
"We're sorry Johnny but we can't have you wetting yourself in the tent on our big camping trip, you're gonna have to stay here while we go out."

"But mom!" Johnny whined.

"No buts young man, now we are gonna have to get you a diaper to make sure you don't make a mess."

"Mom please you don't understand it had to be Susan and Mary they did this to me."

Johnny tried to convince his parents this was his mothers doing but they just wouldn't listen. Susan and Mary entered the room with fake concern on their faces.

"Mom, Dad," said Susan, "You guys can go out and get the car ready, Mary and I can get Johnny all ready for his weekend alone.

"Thank you very much girls, come on Dukey, let's get you in the car" the Test parents walked out of Johnny's room with Dukey looking back with a sad concern for his best friend.

"Well well well," mocked Mary, "Looks like the little baby Johnny is gonna have a fun weekend huh."

Johnny trudged toward his sisters with fire in his eyes, "I know you guys are responsible for this!"

"You're right we are," Susan said matter of factly.

Johnny was a bit shocked they just admitted it and said, "Well then---fix me!"

"Ok," Mary said, "Come with us and we'll fix your little problem."

Johnny was surprised they had caved so easily but eagerly went along with them up to the lab. The girls walked up to a huge machine and the doors opened slid open. "Okay just step right inside and the x-ray verification should be able to bi pass your binary..."

"Yada yada yada just fix me!" Johnny interrupted and ran into the machine as the doors closed behind him.

Susan and Mary walked up to the control panel and Susan said, "Nice jab making up all that scientific jibber jabber about the machine, I'm surprised he doesn't recognize the auto dresser, oh did you call her?"

"Oh course," Mary said as she held up a poster, "Sissy Blakely's 24/7 Babysitting Service, I'm sure she and Johnny will have plenty of fun while we are out camping, but we better hurry and get him dressed, she'll be here in a little bit."

"Alright let's get started."

Meanwhile Johnny stood inside the tube waiting for his sisters to fix his problem. He finally heard the machine's gears turn and whizz to life. Suddenly, Johnny felt two metal arms on either side of him pulling at his clothes. He tried to put up a fight but the arms were just too strong. Soon enough they had removed all his clothes and left him completely nude. Then to his utmost horror he saw the arms display a thick white diaper! He fought even harder but it was no use as he was rubbed with lotion and baby powder and eventually taped up with a diaper.

The doors to the capsule opened up and he ran out to confront his sisters but the entire lab had reformed. He was now standing in a nursery meant for a baby! He looked at the stairs of the capsule and saw a handwritten note and realized it was his sister's handwriting. He snatched the note up and began to read it: Dear Johnny, as you may have noticed we lied to you. We have given you the appropriate wear for your week without us and changed the lab's environment to fit you. Have fun baby Johnny. PS we couldn't just leave a baby alone so we called someone to watch you. She should be showing up right about....now.

Johnny immediately heard footsteps walking up the stairs coming closer and closer to the nursery doors he hides behind a changing table and watches as none other than the person he hates most Sissy Blakely enter the room holding a diaper bag on her shoulder. "Ohh Johnny!" she said with a smile, "Come out! It's time to play!"

Johnny didn't know what to do! He could just hide where he is and hope she doesn't find him or he could go out and beg for her to help him. Johnny decides to...

"Hey, Johnny!", yelled Susan, "you forgot these!" Johnny watched as a set of house keys were thrown down to him. At the last second, however, the keys exploded in midair, leaving nothing but ashes left before they even hit the ground. Johnny signed and continued his limping waddle to the garage door, which he knew couldn't have been locked. When he was about to open it, however, he noticed a problem in his plan.

He had to poop so badly that, if he used too much force to pull up the door, he would surely end up with a large lump in the back. He knew he had to try, though. Johnny very slowly bent over and got into position to pull upwards.

"Alright, three, two, one!" Johnny yelled as he forced up with all the might he had left. What Johnny didn't know, however, was that his sister's had expected him to come through the garage the entire time, and had set up cameras to watch the action unfold.

Just after Johnny got the garage door up, he bent over and gripped his stomach tightly. His sister's camera's caught every detail of his shameful act. Starting with a few small farts, Johnny's body held on for as long as it could. He fell to his hands and knees and bent over slightly. the force in which the mess was leaving his body was too great for him. With a long "Pfrrrrrrrrrt!", his colon emptied into his pink training pants at light speed. After it was over, Johnny attemped to stand, but fell directly on his butt, squishing the mess all over his backside.

Mary and Susan, who had remained silent for this entire ordeal, broke out laughing, tears forming in their eyes from joy. Johnny started to sob, this time successfully able to stand up. His walk of shame was dreadful, the mess slapped against his backside with every step, causing the plastic to crinkle whenever he moved. 1251.content:
The girls were working on a pill that will allow the human body to use all of the energy of food they eat, in order to reduce waste.
"Experiment number 27, test subject rabbit 84 square" Said Mary as she pored the vile full of glowing green liquid.
"I really hope this one doesn't die, or start starving to death this time" Susan said figures crossed as Mary pored the experiment. Subject 84 square approached the water bowl, and began drinking. The girls took several steps back and watched in anticipation. As the subject finished it...... turned around and ran on it's wheel as it always does.
"Well the good news is it didn't explode" Mary said walk closer to the subjects cage.
"Yeah but we won't know if it worked until a few days from now."
"Well then let the observations begin!"
The girls got their notepads, pens, chairs and their recording equipment.
"Day one, the test subject lived through phase one, now recording phase two, how long will test subject 84 square last?" Both girls wrote down on their notepads.
"Through out the rest of the day, the subject did nothing out of the ordinarily, the subject ate it's food, ran on it's wheel, and slept."
"Day two, test subject still shows no sigh of effects of the experiment."
"Day three, the subject has started eating less, this could be a sigh of the starvation, the subjects starve themselves by thinking they are fun, but their body is slowly dying"
"Day four - six, the subject has been eating the same amount of food, for the last four days. This may be a sigh of the body now regulating it'self"
"Day Seven, it has now been a week, time to clean the cage and see if the subject has left any waste." After both of the girls finished the log they placed the subject into a different cage. Then proceeded to clean the cage, while cleaning they noticed something ground breaking. It had no waste. Nothing, they cleaned the cage on day two after the experiment started just so the subject would have time for it's body to react. But there was nothing now.
"It worked!" Yelled Mary
"Where's Johnny?1?" Both girls said at once.
At that moment a hologram of themselves informed them that Johnny is at a summer camp and won't return for a few more days.
"We can wait that long, we need to start human testing now!" Susan said with much excitement.
"But which one of us is going to take it?" Asked Mary

"That was the plan" you said

You get up and walk to the girls room and instantly hear their cry's. You walk up to Susan who is bawling like a real baby tears and all. You unlock the crib,lift her out and lay her on the changing table still crying. You change her diaper, cleaned her and lay her on the mat. You do the same with Mary and lay her on the mat as well. they are still crying so you put pacifirs in their mouths but they spit it back out.

"Babies should never spit their pacies out unless they want to get punished" you say as you stick the pacifiers back in their mouths
